        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            LABEL "org.opencontainers.image.title"="Cygnus-LD Data Peristence"
          
          
            
            LABEL "org.opencontainers.image.title"="Cygnus-LD Data Persistence"
          
      
    
    
  

Similar typo in other LABEL in this PR
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -346,3 +346,13 @@ ENTRYPOINT ["/cygnus-entrypoint.sh"]
 # Ports used by cygnus-ngsi
 EXPOSE ${CYGNUS_SERVICE_PORT} ${CYGNUS_API_PORT}
 
+LABEL "maintainer"="Cygnus Team. Telefónica I+D"
+LABEL "org.opencontainers.image.authors"="iot_support@tid.es"
+LABEL "org.opencontainers.image.documentation"="https://fiware-cygnus.rtfd.io/"
+LABEL "org.opencontainers.image.vendor"="Telefónica Investigación y Desarrollo, S.A.U"
+LABEL "org.opencontainers.image.licenses"="AGPL-3.0-only"
+LABEL "org.opencontainers.image.title"="Cygnus-LD Data Peristence"

nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            docker image build --build-arg SOURCE_BRANCH=$SOURCE_BRANCH \
          
          
            
            	--label "org.opencontainers.image.created"=$(date +%Y-%m-%d) \
          
          
            
            	--label "org.opencontainers.image.revision"=$SOURCE_COMMIT \
          
          
            
            	--label "org.opencontainers.image.version"=$DOCKER_TAG \
          
          
            
            	-f docker/cygnus-ngsi-ld/Dockerfile \
          
          
            
            	-t $IMAGE_NAME-ld \
          
          
            
            	.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,18 @@
 # For those usages not covered by the GNU Affero General Public License please contact with iot_support at tid dot es
 
 cd ../../
-docker build \
-  -f docker/cygnus-ngsi/Dockerfile \
-  -t ${IMAGE_NAME} \
-  .
+docker image build --build-arg SOURCE_BRANCH=$SOURCE_BRANCH \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.created"=$(date +%Y-%m-%d) \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.revision"=$SOURCE_COMMIT \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.version"=$DOCKER_TAG \
+	-f docker/cygnus-ngsi/Dockerfile \
+	-t $IMAGE_NAME \
+	.
+
+docker image build --build-arg SOURCE_BRANCH=$SOURCE_BRANCH \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.created"=$(date +%Y-%m-%d) \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.revision"=$SOURCE_COMMIT \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.version"=$DOCKER_TAG \
+	-f docker/cygnus-ngsi-ld/Dockerfile \
+	-t $IMAGE_NAME-ld \
+	.

@@ -17,7 +17,18 @@
 # For those usages not covered by the GNU Affero General Public License please contact with iot_support at tid dot es
 
 cd ../../
-docker build \
-  -f docker/cygnus-ngsi/Dockerfile \
-  -t ${IMAGE_NAME} \
-  .
+docker image build --build-arg SOURCE_BRANCH=$SOURCE_BRANCH \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.created"=$(date +%Y-%m-%d) \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.revision"=$SOURCE_COMMIT \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.version"=$DOCKER_TAG \
+	-f docker/cygnus-ngsi/Dockerfile \
+	-t $IMAGE_NAME \
+	.
+
+docker image build --build-arg SOURCE_BRANCH=$SOURCE_BRANCH \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.created"=$(date +%Y-%m-%d) \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.revision"=$SOURCE_COMMIT \
+	--label "org.opencontainers.image.version"=$DOCKER_TAG \
+	-f docker/cygnus-ngsi-ld/Dockerfile \

+	.
